messages.title: JO SWINSON'S PLAN FOR BRITAIN'S FUTURE:
messages.content: Stop Brexit and invest the £50 billion Remain Bonus in public services and tackling inequality.

messages.title: TACKLE THE CLIMATE EMERGENCY
messages.content: Generate 80% of our electricity from renewables by 2030 and insulate all low-income homes by 2025.

messages.title: GIVE EVERY CHILD THE BEST START IN LIFE
messages.content: Recruit 20,000 more teachers as part of an extra £10 billion a year for schools.

messages.title: BUILD A FAIRER ECONOMY
messages.content: Provide free childcare for 9 months and give every adult £10,000 to spend on skills and training.

messages.title: TRANSFORM OUR MENTAL HEALTH SERVICES
messages.content: Treat mental health with the same urgency as physical health.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stop Brexit and invest the £50 billion Remain Bonus in public services and tackling inequality.
Generate 80% of our electricity from renewables by 2030 and insulate all low-income homes by 2025.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Give Every Child the Best Start in Life

Provide free childcare for 9 months and give every adult £10,000 to spend on skills and training.
Treat mental health with the same urgency as physical health.

issues.health: Transform Our Mental Health Services: Treat mental health with the same urgency as physical health.

endorsements.endorsement: I'm impressed by Jo Swinson, I think if I was living in a lot of parts of the country I would be tempted to vote Liberal Democrat.
Millions of Tories will now vote Lib Dem because of Brexit

images.caption: Stop Brexit BUILD A BRIGHTER FUTURE

leaflet.additionalNotes: Can you trust Boris Johnson's pro-Brexit Party?
